props.alt: Alternate text for screen readers. Leave empty for decorative images.
props.aspectRatio: Calculated as `width/height`, so for a 1920x1080px image this will be `1.7778`. Will be calculated automatically if omitted.
props.cover: Resizes the background image to cover the entire container.
props.draggable: Controls the `draggable` behavior of the image. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Global_attributes/draggable).
props.lazySrc:
Something to show while waiting for the main image to load, typically a small base64-encoded thumbnail. Has a slight blur filter applied.  
NOTE: This prop has no effect unless either `height` or `aspect-ratio` are provided.
props.crossorigin: Specify that images should be fetched with CORS enabled [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#crossorigin)
props.position: Applies [object-position](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/object-position) styles to the image and placeholder elements.
props.referrerpolicy: Define which referrer is sent when fetching the resource [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#referrerpolicy)
props.options: Options that are passed to the [Intersection observer](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Intersection_Observer_API) constructor.
props.src: The image URL. This prop is mandatory.
props.srcset: A set of alternate images to use based on device size. [Read more...](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#attr-srcset).
props.transition: The transition to use when switching from `lazy-src` to `src`. Can be one of the [built in](/styles/transitions/) or custom transition.
props.gradient: The gradient to apply to the image. Only supports [linear-gradient](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/gradient/linear-gradient) syntax, anything else should be done with classes.

slots.placeholder: Display an overlay while the image is loading.
slots.error: Will be shown if the image fails to load, replacing the placeholder slot.
slots.sources: A list of `` elements. If this slot is used v-img will render a `` instead of ``.

events.error: Emitted if the image fails to load.
events.load: Emitted when the image is loaded.
events.loadstart: Emitted when the image starts to load.

exposed.currentSrc: The current source of the image. This is the image that is currently being displayed. This is useful for determining if the image is loading or not.
exposed.naturalHeight: The natural height of the image.
exposed.naturalWidth: The natural width of the image.
exposed.state: The current state of the image. This is useful for determining if the image is loading or not.
